name: cozy couch and bedside organizer caddy
notes:
create a practical and stylish cozy couch and bedside organizer caddy with this beginner-friendly crochet pattern. the pattern guides you through crafting a 16" wide x 25" long organizer that is perfect for keeping your essentials within reach.
  
the cozy couch and bedside organizer caddy is perfect for your favorite chair, sofa, or right in the bedroom - and ready to hold everything you like to keep close at hand, safe and organized! how does it work? the first section of the bedside organizer slips between the mattress and box springs (or along the inside of the couch) to hold it in place. make this easy crochet pattern and make your everyday life easier!
  
**unique features-**
  
• versatile design suitable for both couches and bedside tables
• detailed written pattern with video tutorial for visual learners
• features optional stripes/colorwork for added visual interest
• easy to follow instructions for beginners
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• hook: 5.5mm (us size 9.0)
• yarn: [red heart with love](https://amzn.to/3ybu4rn) (solids) (aran weight, 350-400 yards)
